](https://www.tuya.com/trustcenter/data_privacy)

Trust Center

Trust comes from transparency. Tuya strictly adheres to domestic and international information security standards, integrating compliance requirements into its internal control framework. Through privacy by design and default security design, Tuya ensures the full compliance and security of its cloud platform.

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/470896040145571840.png)

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/676345834731868160.jpg)

Security

Tuya builds its data security protection system to the highest standards, committed to safeguarding customer data from security threats and ensuring system security and business continuity.

Learn More

Global Compliance

Tuya is committed to complying with global privacy and security standards, strictly adhering to data protection and cybersecurity regulations such as GDPR and CCPA. Our security and privacy practices are widely recognized by third parties worldwide and are regularly audited to ensure ongoing compliance. We also publish white papers regularly to help customers gain a comprehensive understanding of Tuya's security and privacy practices.

Learn More

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/681411864730669056.png)

![](https://seapromotionstatic.cdn5th.com/static/676346886608785408.jpg)

Data Privacy

Data privacy protection is a key mission for Tuya. We are committed to strictly adhering to privacy protection regulations worldwide and employing advanced organizational and technical measures to ensure comprehensive protection of user data throughout its collection, transmission, storage, and destruction processes.

Learn More

Trusted Resources

White Paper on Information Security & Compliance

The Tuya Security and Compliance White Paper elaborates on the company's strict standards and practices in data protection, privacy compliance, and security management.

[

View Docs

](https://images.tuyaus.com/rms-static/29f9f040-c694-11ef-8ff4-33fe22733611-1735552513348.pdf?tyName=Tuya%20Smart%20White%20Paper%20%20V6.0.pdf)

Tuya GDPR White Paper

The Tuya GDPR White Paper provides a detailed explanation of how Tuya complies with the stringent requirements of the GDPR and how it ensures the protection of data subjects' rights.

[

View Docs

](https://images.tuyacn.com/rms-static/a06d2380-658b-11ed-b55f-0761daf5ff1b-1668588588472.pdf?tyName=TUYA%20GDPR%20WHITEPAPER%20V3.2%20final.pdf)

Tuya AI Sec&Compliance White Paper

The Tuya AI Security and Compliance White Paper systematically summarizes the company’s leading practices and structured experience in AI security and compliance governance.

[

View Docs

](https://images.tuyaus.com/rms-static/aa11e1d0-e631-11f0-946a-f10d211a0860-1767176142957.pdf?tyName=Tuya%20AI%20Sec%26Compliance%20White%20Paper%20v1.0.pdf)
